nodes.long_description:
Welcome to "MMA Cage Conquest," where MMA meets VR in a heart-pounding fusion of combat and immersion. Step into authentic arenas where every fight is a thrilling test of skill, strategy, and determination.

In "MMA Cage Conquest," you're not just a spectator—you're the star. Whether you're a seasoned veteran or a fresh-faced newcomer, the Champion's Journey beckons, offering challenges, triumphs, and unforgettable moments.

Train diligently across various fighting styles to outmaneuver your opponents. Then, test your mettle in high-stakes online championships, from intense one-on-one battles to team-based showdowns.

Climb the ranks to unlock new arenas and customize your fighter with a vast array of equipment. Feel every punch, kick, and submission hold with cutting-edge VR technology, immersing you in the raw thrill of combat.

Are you ready to embark on the ultimate conquest, prove yourself as the undisputed champion of "MMA Cage Conquest," and etch your name among the legends of the sport? The choice is yours.
nodes.short_description: Step into the immersive world of Cage Conquest, where dynamic combat takes center stage in authentic arenas. Embark on the Champion's Journey, honing your skills through strategic training to conquer online championships. Experience the thrill of victory in VR.

nodes.change_log:
We are thrilled to announce a significant update that brings a fresh wave of excitement to your gaming experience. With this latest release, we have rolled out multiplayer mode, enhancing your adventures with thrilling, real-time interactions with friends and players worldwide.

But that's not all! We're also introducing two brand-new maps:

Construction Map: Navigate through a bustling construction site, filled with challenging obstacles and strategic vantage points.

Ring Map: Engage in intense battles within a dynamic ring, designed to test your skills and adaptability.

To further enrich your gaming journey, we've added four new female characters to the roster. Each character comes with unique abilities and backstories, offering diverse options for your gameplay strategies.

Thank you for being a part of our community and for your continued support. We can't wait to see how you take on these new challenges and explore the new features.

Happy gaming!

We're thrilled to announce some exciting new additions to our game! Here's what's new:

Maps

� Construction Map: Get ready to navigate the intricate layout of a bustling construction site. Watch your step!

� Mmap Ring Map: Engage in intense battles within the dynamic and ever-changing Mmap Ring. Strategy is key!

Characters

� Introducing 4 New Female Characters: Our roster is expanding! Meet our fierce new female heroes, each bringing their unique abilities and styles to the battlefield.

Dive into these new features and experience the latest enhancements. Your feedback is always appreciated. Happy gaming! �

We are excited to announce a substantial update to our MMA
 game, now available on the Meta Quest Store! This release 
 includes a variety of new features and significant enhancements 
 designed to elevate your gaming experience.

New Features:

Three New Maps:

Subway: Battle it out in the gritty underground tunnels of a 
 subway station. This map features intricate pathways, realistic 
 lighting, and dynamic environmental effects that make every 
 fight an immersive experience.

City: Engage in intense combat in the bustling cityscape. With 
 towering skyscrapers, detailed streets, and interactive elements, 
 this map provides a vivid urban battlefield for your fights.
 
Ring Map: Step into the classic fighting ring with enhanced 
 graphics and realistic surroundings. The ring's atmosphere is 
 designed to replicate the thrill of a professional MMA bout, 
 complete with cheering crowds and authentic arena sounds.
 
New Lobby Map:

We’ve added a sophisticated new lobby map where players can 
 roam freely. Inside this lobby, players can choose their 
 gameplay mode, including single-player mode, character 
 selection, and map selection. The lobby features a sleek design 
 and social interaction areas, enhancing the pre-fight 
 experience and strategic planning zones.
 
Four New Characters:

We’re introducing four new fighters to the roster, each with 
 unique fighting styles and abilities. These new characters bring 
 fresh tactics and strategies to your matches, allowing you to 
 explore different approaches and master new skills.
 
Gameplay Enhancements:
 
Updated Physics:
 
Experience more realistic and responsive player movements with 
 our updated physics engine. Every punch, kick, and move feels 
 more authentic, enhancing the overall immersion.
Enhanced AI:

Our AI opponents have been upgraded with 100% physics-based 
 animations, making them smarter and more aggressive. Expect 
 tougher, more dynamic fights as the AI adapts to your 
 strategies and pushes your skills to the limit. The new AI ensures 
 that every bout is a unique challenge, demanding greater 
 tactical thinking and faster reflexes.
 
Improved Gameplay Mechanics:
 
We have introduced a rounds system to add more structure and 
 excitement to the matches. The gameplay loop for both the 
 player and the enemy has been redesigned to enhance the 
 overall experience.
 
New FBik:
 
We’ve incorporated Full-Body Inverse Kinematics (FBik) to make 
 player and enemy movements more realistic and fluid, 
 providing a better sense of physical interaction in the game.
 
Updated UI:
 
We’ve redesigned our user interface to provide an enhanced look 
 and feel. The new UI offers a more intuitive and visually 
 appealing experience, making navigation easier and enhancing 
 your overall gaming experience. Key changes include 
 streamlined menus, clearer icons, and more accessible in-game 
 information.
 
These updates are part of our ongoing commitment to providing 
 the best possible gaming experience. We’re dedicated to 
 continually improving and expanding our game based on your 
 valuable feedback.
 
Thank you for your continued support. We can’t wait to see you 
 in the new arenas and experience the enhanced gameplay!
 
Best regards, The MMA Game Development Team
